Short Description:
WhatToWager.com's NFL betting system and college football and basketball systems use an unbiased, statistically based formula to find you the best sports betting values. Some weeks, there might be 15 games; other weeks, there might be none. We only give you the games with the best chance of winning.

Best of all, we do all the work for you. We look at current NFL spreads, college football spreads and college basketball spreads, compare them against a number of factors, then determine the best games and the best picks.

Our NFL betting system is our specialty, but we also are refining our systems for college football betting and college basketball betting.

What's the edge?

The "edge" is a gauge of how much of a value a game is. Put simply, the higher the edge, the more likely the game is to cover. Put technically, the edge is a measure of how far the actual line of the game deviates from what WTW thinks it should be.

Sports bets cannot be placed on WhatToWager.com. We offer a free service to help sports gamblers make decisions on which games to bet.

Short Description:
Oddstackr is a players vs players sports gaming system that lets players customize odds in pool-style games.

Just like in fantasy sport where players are given "virtual money" to manage, in Oddstackr players are given "odds" to manage (share) across a given set of outcomes (predictions) (these predictions may be preset or drafted by the players).

And just like in fantasy sports, players win based on points, in Oddstackr players win based on points too. 

Some predictions will occur (happen) while some won't occur (don't happen).

Odds given to outcomes that "occured" become points and players are ranked according to the "sum of all their points" (their score).

Players that make it into the "win margin", win and share the prize money according to the "winning structure".

Players can participate in tournaments, double-up or head to head games.

With Oddstackr players have control and win based on their skill in "stacking" (customizing/distributing/managing) the odds.

We are an igaming company with a focus on innovation and new opportunities for the industry.

Our first product "Oddstackr" is the first of three new and disruptive systems we are introducing to the market. It brings new opportunites to both operators and users in the industry through B2B partnerships and in time, B2C offerings.

We aim to bring about a new era of customer-centric products in the global igaming industry.

Our goal is to achieve this through development of new systems, with value driven innovation and great user experience at our core.

Technologies: Gmail, Google Apps, DigitalOcean, Google Cloud Hosting, Digital Ocean DNS, Apache, WordPress.org, Mobile Friendly, Hotjar, Bootstrap Framework, Google Maps (Non Paid Users), Google Tag Manager, Google Maps, YouTube, Google Font API, Shutterstock, Facebook Widget, Facebook Custom Audiences, Ubuntu, Facebook Login (Connect)
Short Description:
Our Story
All-in Global started in 2008 as the first company to offer localisation and content writing tailored specifically to the gaming industry. Today, we're widely recognised as the #1 LSP within this sector.

Throughout the years, we've grown our portfolio by adding some related sectors to our fields of expertise: sports betting, esports, sports and FinTech. This way, we matured into a full-service provider of language solutions you can bet on, including content writing, SEO and AudioVisual services in 70+ languages. Hence the decision to rebrand from All-in Translations to All-in Global in 2019.

Our organization was delicately crafted with a specific mission in mind: to help game developers, platform providers, operators, affiliates and esports clubs make the most of emerging markets in the world.

What's the story behind our start-up? Roy Pedersen, a sports journalist, was a regular visitor of online sports betting and poker platforms. While playing and betting, he spotted the terrible quality of translations. It was clear
to him that the content had been translated by people with null knowledge of gaming, or with second-rate languages skills. He then asked some like-minded colleagues to check the same sites in their own languages.
Needless to say, their findings were often similar. Add the fact that competition was non-existent, so the conclusion was easily at hand: All-in Global was a good idea.
A report from May 2019 from marketresearchreports.com confirmed this when they announced the 10 biggest gambling companies. All-in Global had 9 of them as regular clients over the last 10 years.
We achieved all the above by being a fair, respectful, diverse and socially responsible enterprise. We've been working with more than 700 people from 85 countries, and All-in Global is making donations/volunteering to Translators without Borders, UNICEF, European Cancer Leagues, People In Need, charity: water, I Love Street Children and Trash Hero.
Best regards,
All-in

SEO Description: Career - job offer at Betsys Are you a developer, developer and new technology? Stay on course and join Betsys.
Technologies: Vimeo, Google Font API, Google Tag Manager, WordPress.org, Mobile Friendly, Hotjar, Apache
Short Description:
Jsme největším dodavatelem sázkového softwaru ve střední Evropě. Již od roku 2000 parta aktuálně 85 kolegů pracuje z pražského Karlína i polské pobočky v Katovicích na ucelené řadě produktů a služeb, které pokrývají celé spektrum sázení na sportovní, virtuální i esportová utkání.

V Betsys pracujeme s živými daty. Veškeré procesy proto musí být neskutečně rychlé. Zároveň musí být připravené na velmi vysokou zátěž, výkon a objem dat. Největší instalace denně navštíví více než 500 tisíc lidí, kteří přes ně provedou 1,2 milionu finančních operací a vsadí 570 tisíc tiketů. Naše sport-techové řešení slouží zákazníkům ze společností Sazka, Fortuna nebo polské STS.

Schovat se v davu anonymních vývojářů tady není možné. Každý tým má svoji zodpovědnost a tu přenáší i na své členy. Rozvoj a zdokonalování každého je naprostá priorita. Zůstat na místě znamená nerozkvést.

Koho hledáme?

V roce 2019 jsme se rozrostli o 40 nových Betsysáků, v roce 2020 o 53, ale nestačí to. Jsme softwarová firma, takže většina officu je zaplněna programátory (#php, #python, #postgresql), kteří fungují v "self-managed" týmech v agilním prostředí. Nejde o korporát, takže žádná byrokracie, naopak pohodová atmosféra a parta fajn lidí, kteří se rádi učí nové věci a posouvají tak dopředu sebe i celou firmu. Najdeš mezi námi třeba šachistu, metalistu, wakeboardistu a další. Jo, a hýčkáme si i devět holek.

Co je dobré vědět?

Šéfové v Betsys dobře ví, že nejde pořád jen sedět za počítačem. A proto mají Dinu – královnu firemních eventů. I díky ní se pravidelně, většinou dvakrát za měsíc, společně vyrážíme na pivo, sportovat, zajezdit si na motokárách nebo pokosit kolegy na laser game. Pořádají se ale i pizza days, offsite akce, večírky a meet-upy. Benefity si tady každý můžeme vybrat, jaké chce. Co ale jako Betsysáci oceňujeme úplně nejvíc, je perfektní občerstvení v officu.

We are a group of professionals with a keen interest in online casino gaming that is shaping the Indian gambling industry.

My Casino Guru started in 2020 with a realization that we had to educate Indian players about the casinos.

The digital population in India has grown tremendously. The access to fast and cheap internet had accelerated the online gaming industry too. Online casinos are fairly new for Indian players and this fact was even more evident during the lockdown when everyone around us was playing casino games.

Keywords: alternative investment, sports betting, asset allocation
Technologies: Amazon AWS
Short Description:
Bet Analytics started its activities in February 2012 and the main goal was to identify and capture price inefficiencies and specific liquidity patterns in the soccer and horse race betting market.

The core solution was a mix between ad-hoc predictive models and asset allocation models able to identify the next best race and horse to invest on, the right amount to allocate in order to minimize volatility and manage risk properly.

Bet Analytics used to automatically manage a huge amount of historical data and constantly improve their statistical models. Those models helped them to win thousands of euros for months and to raise a seed investment from an angel investor to further develop the technology. 

The following "ad-hoc" high fees applied by one of the most known betting provider forced Bet Analytics to abandon the project.

Short Description:
KONVERGENZ IST DER DIGITALE ZUKUNFTSMOTOR

Die Konvergenz lässt Produkte, Businessmodelle und Märkte verschmelzen, die vorher klar getrennt waren. Die zunehmende horizontale Vernetzung ersetzt klassische Marktstrukturen und Silo-Denken.

Konvergenz ist ein zentrales Element der Digitalisierung. Das iPhone, das den Siegeszug des mobilen Internets erst ermöglicht hat, macht die grundlegenden Veränderungen in einem Gerät sichtbar. „Ein iPod. Ein Handy. Ein Internet-Gerät. Das sind nicht drei unterschiedliche Geräte. Es ist nur ein einziges. Und wir nennen es iPhone! Heute erfindet Apple das Telefon neu", verkündete Jobs in seiner Keynote 2007. Dies ist ein Symbol für die Konvergenz der Digitalisierung. Marktgrenzen verschwinden, ein Computerhersteller erfindet das Telefon neu, Versicherungen werden zu Banken, Kabelprovider bieten Triple-Play, Markteintrittsbarrieren verschwinden und etablierte Marken, wie Nokia oder Kodak, fallen der Digitalisierung zum Opfer. Disruption wird zum Schreckgespenst, Plattform-Giganten mit grenzenlosem Wachstum pulverisieren Märkte und Marken, die die neuen Wettbewerber gar nicht auf dem Schirm hatten.

Die Lehren daraus breiten sich wie eine Druckwelle aus. Was zuerst die Musikindustrie traf, revolutioniert die gesamte Entertainmentbranche und bald auch die Schlüsselindustrien, wie Automobilhersteller. Niemand ist mehr sicher.

Die digitale Transformation ist nicht nur ein technischer Vorgang, sie beginnt im Kopf. Das tradierte Silo-Denken muss der neuen Realität der horizontalen Vernetzung weichen. Nur diese Öffnung ermöglicht die Sicherung der Marktposition sowie die Zukunftsfähigkeit durch Verlängerung der Wertschöpfungskette oder Erschließung neuer Marktpotentiale – durch neues Denken, neue Allianzen oder Partnering mit Spezialisten.

Nutzen Sie die Konvergenz als Wettbewerbsvorteil – sprechen sie uns an.

HISTORY

Spigo was founded in 2006 in Denmark, creating community games websites in 16 languages across 20 countries. Initially creating a total of 50 small to mid-sized casual games, Spigo had more than 25 million visitors during the first five years, some of whom became subscribers.

Around 2012, Spigo made drastic changes for the better, totally recreating its games platform to accommodate a new focus on portable devices, scalability and money games. This change in direction was accompanied by the business model shifting its main attention from end consumers to becoming a software developer, providing robust, casual and social money games.

COMPANY

Privately held company set up in Viborg, Denmark with branch offices in St. Julians, Malta, and Miami, USA. Spigo is a 100% independent provider of online gaming software on regulated markets – it holds a MGA (Malta Gaming Authority) license and the software meets the criteria for the Danish market outlined by the Danish Gaming Authority.

CULTURE

Spigo embraces a culture of high transparency within the company, with our partners and with our players. We are driven by our results and take pride seeing our gaming products making a difference to the gaming landscape. We try to stay lean with our workforce, but think big with ideas for our future within gaming. Every employee is a key player on the team.

VISION

Spigo will remain the best software provider in the casual and social online gaming industry, with particular focus on QUALITY, ENDURANCE and SECURITY.

BetOptimizer is a UK-based Sports Betting, Sports Spread Betting and Sports Arbitrage Betting Advisory and Management Company created to invest in Sports Betting Opportunities in key markets and creating significant and consistent annual return on investment for investors.

We offer investors a 15% fixed interest corporate bond, incorporates a 10% Stop-Loss secured by debenture, runs for 7 years but is redeemable after 1 year on 3 months notice.

BetOptimizer is raising capital from Bond Holders to invest in a diverse range of strategies which consistently ‘beat the odds'; the management team and advisors have a near 4 year track record in the Sports Betting field and during this time gained in excess of 200% return on investment and have not had a single month with negative returns. 

BetOptimizer sets weekly performance goals based on the betting strategies received and before any bets are placed, careful analysis of the following factors take place: teams, players, weather conditions, team/club policies, previous performances. We place bets on the sports that are transparent, popular and have massive capitalization such as football, tennis, and horse racing. We are also investigation Sports Betting Opportunities in other sports including Cricket, Baseball, Ice Hockey and Handball. One key component to the risk diversification system is spread betting, BetOptimizer expects that once our Bond is fully subscribed that we will place between 500 and 5,000 diversified bets on various global sports each month. Once the bond is fully subscribed each betting position for any single event will never exceed more than 1% of the total invested funds BetOptimizer has under management. This restriction ensures that any single bet placed cannot have a materially significant impact on the overall performance of BetOptimizer.

Keywords: odds delivery, odds delivery & sports betting analytics, sports betting analytics
Short Description:
Sports Core Analytics' ambition is to produce the best possible evaluations of match results and we believe that the key is a constant interchange between a pricing model and an expert analysis. This is the core of our concept. And when the quality is high, the whole is greater than the sum of its parts. 1+1=3. 

Sports Core Analytics has two main products:
 
1.     Analysis of the handling of odds setting and trading for football matches. Here we closely monitor one or several leagues and place test bets where our model identifies valuebets. These bets are registered and processed in a database with a view to improve the product. 

2.     Active supplementing – and potentially replacement of parts – of the daily handling of football leagues, from odds deliveries to trading.  

The model developed by Sports Core Analytics encompasses two types of data: static and dynamic. From the very beginning we have been aware that a certain amount of information regarding the individual matches is usually not incorporated into the trading models: the market movements. Our intuitive sense told us that these movements hold important information. "The market is always right", some people will claim. In real life is it not so black and white – on the contrary; there is more to it. We relate to the fact that every week, in each league, great changes occur from the time when odds on a certain match are put up till kick off. And this does not happen by coincidence but for a reason. Therefore we introduced the dynamic element in the model.

Short Description:
The World Lottery Association (WLA) is an international, member-based organization of state-authorized lotteries and suppliers to the global lottery industry. Its mission is to advance the collective interests of its members and to facilitate their development through the provision of a range of lottery-related services, such as internationally recognized lottery sector standards.

WLA Lottery Members are organizations licensed or authorized to conduct lotteries or sports betting operations in a jurisdiction domiciled in a state recognized by the United Nations. The majority of their net revenues must be dedicated to supporting the public good. As stipulated by the WLA Code of Conduct, all WLA Member Lotteries may only sell their products to consumers within the jurisdiction in which they are licensed. WLA Associate Members are suppliers of goods and services to the lottery or sports betting industries whose business practices conform to the aims and objectives of the association. Currently, the WLA has 148 Lottery Members and 73 Associate Members drawn from over 81 countries spanning five continents.

Üyelerine, kurulduğu günden itibaren en yüksek kazancı vermeyi hedefleyen Birebin.com, bu amaç doğrultusunda çalışmalarını sürdürmektedir. Sürekli kendini geliştiren ve yenileyen yapısı ile birlikte kullanıcıların bahis heyacanını daha da arttırmayı planlamaktadır. Birebin.com , İddaa Borsası ile üyelerine sosyal bahis topluluğu içinde yer alma imkanı sağlamaktadır. İddaa Borsası, kullanıcıların birbirlerini takip edebileceği, kupon paylaşımında bulunacağı, paylaşılan kuponlara yorum yapacağı ve maç istatistiki bilgileri ile kazanma şansını arttırabileceği sosyal bir platformdur.

Bahis uzmanlarının toplandığı bu platformda Çok Oynananlarda ön plana çıkan kullanıcılar popüler olma fırsatı yakalar. Uzmanların paylaşmış olduğu kuponlara anında oynayabilirsiniz ya da kuponların altına kendi yorumlarınızı yazarak beyin fırtınası yapabilirsiniz.

Short Description:
What Is Sports Perch?

- The premier tool for consuming team and sport knowledge

- An ultra-organized sports content and information hub

The Mission

- To create an amazing and more efficient fan experience by sorting the highest quality sports content and information from across the Internet and making it easily accessible

Why Sports Perch?

The Information Age has brought with it, well, an enormous amount of information. There is more useful (and not so useful) sports content being produced than ever before.

While this is a blessing, it is also our curse; it is scattered through a universe of different sites, page layouts, ads and digital media.

Consider the following quotes from two men much wiser than most:

"We're not that much smarter than we used to be, even though we have much more information - and that means the real skill now is learning how to pick out the useful information from all this noise"

- Nate Silver, FiveThirtyEight Founder

"Basically, our goal is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful."

- Larry Page, Google Co-Founder

If you take Larry's quote and replace "world's" with "sports world's" you will have a pretty good idea of what this operation is all about.

One-Stop Coverage For:
- NFL, Fantasy Football, NFL Draft
- NBA, Fantasy Basketball, NBA Draft
- MLB, Fantasy Baseball
- NHL
- College Football, Football Recruiting
- College Basketball, Basketball Recruiting
- Soccer
- Golf
- High School Football (national & state-by-state)
- High School Basketball (national & state-by-state)
- National TV Games Menu
- Directory of fan sites by sport and by team
- Directory of podcasts by sport
- Local sports coverage for 18 geographic regions across US and Canada
- Top Stories, Trending Now, Highlights, Sports Pop Culture & Recommended Features
- Sports Betting Center

What is the World Gaming Executive Summit?

Now in its 15th year, the World Gaming Executive Summit continues to be the most senior and high-level event for online, land based, lottery and sports betting gaming communities. The seniority, reputation and global reach, not to mention the fantastic networking opportunities and the spectacular setting of the W hotel, makes WGES the most exclusive and influential gathering for the gaming community and all those affiliated to it.

Why you should attend this year?

We're changing the format to the event! What once was a pre-day event followed by 2 main days, will now evolve into a full 3-day summit giving you even more content. 

This year's agenda has been developed by an expert ‘operators-only' advisory board with C-Level representatives including Caesars, William Hill, Parimatch and Kindred Group. WGES will continue the high-level conversation on how technology and strategy can drive the much-needed change of the gambling industry and how areas can recover from the ongoing pandemic. 

Following an unprecedented 2020, WGES 2021 will be focusing on emerging markets (including sports betting in the USA, India's rise in betting and Africa's changing markets), online and land-based casinos, lotteries, regulation, integrated resorts, CSR and much, much more.
 
Networking opportunities
Networking will continue to be a crucial part of this year's summit and we will ensure that there is a packed agenda throughout the three days. So, whether it's beach drinks, yacht parties, gala dinners or after parties, there will something for everyone to build those valuable relationships.
